sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>package_private</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>global.MenuReferenceQualifier</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <description>Creates a menu reference qualifier filter based on the user roles</description> <name>MenuReferenceQualifier</name> <script><![CDATA[var MenuReferenceQualifier = Class.create(); MenuReferenceQualifier.prototype = { initialize: function() {}, filterMenus: function() { var filter = 'type!=system'; if (!gs.hasRole("maint")) { filter += '^type!=snc_internal'; } return filter; }, type: 'MenuReferenceQualifier' };]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-04-21 07:33:41</sys_created_on> <sys_id>946744bc5b030110fb2a210bb881c778</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>MenuReferenceQualifier</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Polaris Menu Provider" source="com.glide.polaris_menu_provider">b5bbf4a43c35311068bcf327dfe37f51</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_946744bc5b030110fb2a210bb881c778</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-04-21 07:37:51</sys_updated_on> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
